description: Sam finds a photo from last year's birthday party. He wants to use it as a large header image on the website. That should remind his friends about how fun it was last year!
todo: Help Sam add the image to the header!

correct.headline: Great!
correct.text: The website has a nice image in the header now!

wrong.headline: It didn't work!
